ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New VahShir models
ygData.msgSnippet: This was on EQ castersrealm on July 24......  seems like the old world vah shir models are not working yet.  I have not seen anything on any of the sites
ygData.messageBody:
This was on EQ castersrealm on July 24......  seems like the "old world" vah shir models are not working yet.  I have not seen anything on any of the sites that says this has been taken care of... 

This extra message was added by Absor to the Patch Message on the Developers Corner:

    We forgot to include a comment in the patch message about the removal of the 10% healing penalty for non-clerics. The penalty was indeed removed with this patch.

    Also, while we�ve included the new �old-world� Vah Shir models in the patch, you won�t be able to turn them on yet. We�ll have to patch another file to allow you to choose to turn them off in the interface. That should happen soon.

    Kat

     

  DSheln6264@... wrote:

In a message dated 8/1/2002 6:10:34 AM Eastern Daylight Time, DSheln6264@... writes:


ok..will try that and see what happens


What happened was a bunch of bald humans..even the females.  Reactivating the models..anyone else wanna try and tell us the results?



Toni aka     Katashaka Naboombu 

 Championsofwar
